title: Marnie Simpson's boyfriend Casey shares first pic of adorable new baby in gushing post
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Marnie Simpson 's boyfriend, Casey Johnson, has praised her for carrying and giving birth to their son.

Marnie gave birth yesterday afternoon to their baby after a 28 hour labour, and Casey revealed he weighed 8.1 pounds.

The delighted dad penned a touching post dedicated to Marnie and their baby with a photo of their son's tiny hand.

He wrote alongside it: "Where do I start... after 28 hours of labour my strong amazing princess @marns delivered our gorgeous little man on the 29th October at 4:20pm 8.1!!!

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: marns/Instagram)

"My beautiful baby boy was born, I can’t even describe my emotions right now, it’s been a long journey (10 months).

"Watching the person you adore in pain is not nice but the gift we both have right now just wipes away all the bad moments through labour.

"I literally sit and stair at him non stop with Marnie, he’s the start of our family, he’s so cute!!!"

(Image: BACKGRID)

The new parents have not yet announced a name for the youngster.

Casey continued: "Again I wanna say thank you to everybody who has messaged me it means a lot the support has been absolutely amazing.

"Marnie you have done so well you grew this human inside you and boy did you do it perfect and the right way.

(Image: Instagram)

"I love you Marnie thank you for being my baby mumma, you KILLED IT".

They announced the birth to OK! Magazine, saying: "Marnie gave birth to a beautiful baby boy yesterday afternoon. Mother and son are both doing well."

Marnie had been 12 days overdue.
description: Casey Johnson has thanked Marnie for the miracle of child birth as he reveals the first ever photo of their baby boy
